results.title: Pharmaceutical Drug Metformin and MCL1 Inhibitor S63845 Exhibit Anticancer Activity in Myeloid Leukemia Cells via Redox Remodeling
results.text_hl: Pharmaceutical Drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @GENE_MCL1 @GENE_4170 @@@MCL1@@@ Inhibitor @CHEMICAL_S63845 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000614727 @@@S63845@@@ Exhibit Anticancer Activity in @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007951 @@@Myeloid Leukemia@@@ Cells via Redox Remodeling

results.title: [Metformin mitigates doxorubicin-induced cardiotoxicity via the AMPK pathway].
results.journal: Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao
results.text_hl: METHODS: We analyzed the data of 123 patients with @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007951 @@@myeloid leukemia@@@, @DISEASE_Lymphoma_Non_Hodgkin @DISEASE_MESH:D008228 @@@non-Hodgkin's lymphoma@@@, or @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@ receiving @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ for phased chemotherapy, including 43 patients receiving combined treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (test group) and 80 without @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (control group).

citations.NLM: Wei J, Yang Q, Lin L, Zhu C, Wei J. [Metformin mitigates doxorubicin-induced cardiotoxicity via the AMPK pathway]. Nan Fang Yi Ke Da Xue Xue Bao. 2023 Oct 20;43(10):1682-1688. PMID: 37933643

results.title: Suppressive effects of metformin on T-helper 1-related chemokines expression in the human monocytic leukemia cell line THP-1.
results.text_hl: Suppressive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on T-helper 1-related chemokines expression in the @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007951 @@@monocytic leukemia@@@ cell line @CELLLINE_CVCL:0006 @@@THP-1@@@.
